mapper.update: update FIGCLASS f set f.FIGCLASS_STATUS = (case when SYSDATE < TO_DATE(FIGCLASS_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') then '3' when SYSDATE >= TO_DATE(FIGCLASS_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND SYSDATE <= TO_DATE(FIGCLASS_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') then '4' when SYSDATE > TO_DATE(FIGCLASS_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND SYSDATE < TO_DATE(FIGCLASS_CLASS_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') then '5' when SYSDATE >= TO_DATE(FIGCLASS_CLASS_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND SYSDATE <= TO_DATE(FIGCLASS_CLASS_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') then '6' when SYSDATE > TO_DATE(FIGCLASS_CLASS_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') then '7' end) where f.FIGCLASS_ISDELETE = '0' and f.FIGCLASS_STATUS <> '7' and f.FIGCLASS_STATUS <> '0' and f.FIGCLASS_STATUS <> '2'
mapper.select: select * from FIGCLASS f where f.FIGCLASS_ID = #{figClass_id} and f.FIGCLASS_ISDELETE = '0'
select * from FIGCLASS F where F.FIGCLASS_ISDELETE = '0' AND F.FIGCLASS_ID = #{figClass_id} AND F.FIGCLASS_CREATER = #{User_id} AND F.FIGCLASS_NUMSTATUS = '1'
mapper.update: UPDATE FIGCLASS F SET F.FIGCLASS_ISDELETE = '1', F.FIGCLASS_UPDATER = #{User_id}, F.FIGCLASS_UPDATETIME = #{updatetime} WHERE F.FIGCLASS_ID=#{FigClass_id} and F.FIGCLASS_ISDELETE = '0'
UPDATE FIGCLASS F SET F.FIGCLASS_STATUS = #{result_review}, F.FIGCLASS_UPDATER = #{updater}, F.FIGCLASS_UPDATETIME = #{updatetime} WHERE F.FIGCLASS_ID=#{figclass_id} and F.FIGCLASS_ISDELETE = '0'

UPDATE FIGCLASS SET FIGCLASS_NAME=#{FigClass_name}, FIGCLASS_DEPARMENT=#{FigClass_deparment}, FIGCLASS_ADDRESS=#{FigClass_address}, FIGCLASS_START_DATE=#{FigClass_start_date}, FIGCLASS_END_DATE=#{FigClass_end_date}, FIGCLASS_CLASS_START=#{FigClass_class_start}, FIGCLASS_CLASS_END=#{FigClass_class_end}, FIGCLASS_PERNUM=#{FigClass_pernum}, FIGCLASS_PHONE=#{FigClass_phone}, FIGCLASS_PERSON=#{FigClass_person}, FIGCLASS_UPDATER=#{FigClass_updater}, FIGCLASS_UPDATETIME=#{FigClass_updatetime}, FIGCLASS_CAOGERY=#{FigClass_caogery}, FIGCLASS_OUTLINE=#{FigClass_outline} WHERE FIGCLASS_ID = #{FigClass_id} AND FIGCLASS_ISDELETE = '0'
